title: Rumourist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Night 1, you may choose a player to spread **Fear** on. If this player doesn't visit anybody that night, you may choose another player the following night.
- Every night after that, you may choose a player to attack. You will only attack this player if they have **Fear**; otherwise, your ability will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players with **Fear** spread it onto other players they visit.
- You do not know who has **Fear**.
- You are immune to feeling **Fear**.
- If every other living player has **Fear**, your attack raises to Unstoppable and you may attack two players at night. You are informed of this.
- If there are no longer any living players with **Fear**, you will die of boredom.

desc:
Post 5449
*A myth of a mystical shroud following people reaches the ears of many folks in town. This rumor couldn't be true right?*
